channel.title: Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

I am a 3rd year master student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. Currently, I am advised by Prof. Ruixuan Wang, Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang at iSEE-SYSU. I received my B.Sc. Degree from Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University in 07/2018. I was a research intern of Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab, advised by Prof. Liang Lin.

New!!: I am looking for Ph.D position ! !

Research Interest

  • Self-supervised Learning
  • Data imbalance in Medical Image Analysis

Publication

  • Jiaxin Zhuang, Jiaxin Cai, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    Deep kNN for Medical Image Classiﬁcation.
    In Proc. of the International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI) , 2020, Lima, Peru. [PDF] [bib]

    Major contribution: Proposing a training strategy to learn a nonlinear feature extractor from original input images specifically for the kNN classifier.

  • Weipeng Li*, Jiaxin Zhuang*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Wei-Shi Zheng.
    Fusing Metadata and Dermoscopy Images for Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    In Proc. of the IEEE International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging (ISBI), 2020, Iowa, USA. [PDF] [code] [bib]

    Major contribution: using both metadata and image datasets to learn more discriminative for rare diseases.

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data.
    In Proc. of the International Conference on Medical Imaging with Deep Learning (MIDL), 2019, London. [openreview] [code] [bib] [poster] [slides] [zhihu]

    Major contribution: Proposing an attention embedding mechanism into the machine learning process, particularity for learning characteristics of rare diseases.

  • Zili Xu, Jiaxin Zhuang, Rong Zhang, Ruixuan Wang, Xuemei Guo and Wei-Shi Zheng.
    Auxiliary Decoder and Classifier for Imbalanced Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    In Proc. of the International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Computer Science (AICS), 2020, Hangzhou, China. [PDF]

    Major contribution: using encoder-decoder to learn discriminative features to alleviate degradation caused by data imbalance.

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Siyamalan*, Ruixuan Wang , JianGuo Zhang, Jihan Liu, Jiahui Pan, Ziyu Yin.
    Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection Using Deep Neural Network Ensemble.
    In Proc. of the International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention Workshops (MICCAIW) , Granada, Spain, 2018. [PDF]

Awards & Honors

  • The Third Prize Scholarship, 2014-2015
  • The Second Prize Scholarship, 2015-2016
  • The Third Prize Scholarship， 2018-2019
  • The Third Prize Scholarship， 2019-2020
  • Jiaxin Zhuang. Chinese University Students Intelligent Design Competition, Third prize, 2017.
  • Ruoyu Lan, Wenbo Feng, Jiaxin Zhuang.
    Meritorious Winner, Mathematical Contest In Modeling, 2017
  • Yaobing Ke, Jiahao Rao, Jiaxin Zhuang, Lishan Huang, Lin Meng.
    Rank 10 (Among 1117 teams) , Molecular Screening of Drugs Based on Artificial Intelligence, 2018
  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    Rank3 (out of 77 teams) MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018. Note: top 2 teams used additional public dataset to train models. [Code],
  • Excellent Students in iSEE, 2019-2020.
  • Occupied object detection, 21/565. First author, 2021

Teaching

  • TA for Deep learning (Practice Course), Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2019.
    Responsible for part of Image captioning .
  • TA for Deep learning, Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2018

Service

  • Review paper of ICIG2019, IScIDE2019

Interest

Photography, Comics.

» Updated on March-13-2021 «
